description: Try our easy to follow Easter Surprise Cake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Easter Surprise Cake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Spread remaining buttercream over top and side of the cake. Decorate top with 200g of Easter eggs, unwrapping them from foil before placing them. Chill for 30 minutes or until firm, then serve.
